name: Touhou Organ Harvesting
description:
Let's harvest some organs to pay off your debts!

Harvest as much organs as you can, the more you "COMBO" harvest them, the more money you get ;)

btw the heart is the most valuable,  so buy human captives with hearts and harvest them for easy victory.

Regarding cooking methods, please click the text, for example "Blended" click the text under the Blender that says "Blended" to select the method to serve the cuisine.

Touhou Fan Gam Jam 6 Submission, Theme: Combo ;0

Guide/ Tutorial:

In the market with Yukari, click the rectangle with the human in it and a popup will appear, click yes to buy the human. Proceed to next stage, proceed button.

Cook human. Top right will be Remillia Scarlet's order, you have go to bottom panel, storage click, select a human you like to "prepare". Exit from storage, open up operation clicking it, and operate on them, gaining money per operation. Finally, select the cooking method "barbeque", "boiled" by clicking the following text under the image depicting it. Click serve to end this phase.

This will go back to market phase.  YOU HAVE TO AT LEAST BUY ONE HUMAN, if not what are you going to serve?

Repeat until you can pay off your debts :)
